```{r}
library(tidyverse)

library(dplyr)
gdp %>% 
  head()
```

```{r}
gdpLong <- 
  gdp %>% 
  pivot_longer(!c(country,indicator),
               names_to = "year",
               values_to = "GDP")

gdpLong %>% 
  head(10)
```
